metadata.author: GHI Electronics
metadata.description: Simplified product schema with convention-based resource resolution

products.name: CincoBit Rev E
products.tagline: Ultra low-cost, micro:bit inspired, educational board
products.shortDescription: Educators and Makers will find great value in this ultra low-cost board. This is an excellent micro:bit alternative, giving you alligator clip connections and DUELink Downlink connector for Daisylinking modules.

products.name: ClipIt Rev B
products.shortDescription: Educators can now elevate their STEM-mission with Clipit. Start immediately with light sensor and touch pads to read inputs. Then use any of the supported Languages to process those inputs and then control the output on the 5x5 LED matrix and buzzer.

products.name: DueDuino Rev A
products.tagline: Arduino form factor inspired DUELink mainboard
products.shortDescription: Use the official DUELink engine firmware or use the Arduino software IDE to program DueDuino.

products.name: DueSTEM Rev B
products.shortDescription: Input -> Process -> Output is how DueSTEM brings everything educators need to demonstrate physical computing. There are 4 inputs and 4 outputs. The graphical display can be used to show sensor levels or for building games!

products.name: PixoBit Rev D
products.shortDescription: PixoBit upgrades CincoBit with a graphical display. You can now show sensor data or build video games!

products.name: Stamp Rev A
products.tagline: Seeed Xaio Form Factor DUELink Microcomputer
products.shortDescription: This fingertip-sized tiny board is as capable as any other DUELink module. Plug it in a breadboard using male headers, or solder it directly using the edge pads. It includes an upgraded regulator allowing for connecting many DUELink modules on the Downlink connector.

products.name: Stick Rev A
products.tagline: DIP24 Form Factor SMT DUELink SoM
products.shortDescription: Start making your own DUELink modules using this Surface-Mountable DUELink SoM that is also DIP24 form-factor.

products.name: Ghizzy Jr Rev A
products.shortDescription: Is this the smallest, cutest, and smartest key chain in the world? You decide, but this is a mini robot-shaped pocket-sized microcomputer that plugs right into a USB socket!

products.name: Ghizzy Rev B
products.shortDescription: Advanced gaming and graphics module with enhanced capabilities

products.name: Holiday Tree Rev B
products.shortDescription: Festive LED tree module for seasonal projects and decorations

products.name: ePaper M29 Rev A
products.shortDescription: e-Ink (ePaper) displays only need power to update the screen. But then power can be disconnected and the display will retain the graphics with zero power requirements.

products.name: ePaper M42 Rev A
products.shortDescription: e-Ink (ePaper) displays only need power to update the screen. But then power can be disconnected and the display will retain the graphics with zero power requirements.

products.name: HDMI Rev B
products.shortDescription: Add HDMI graphics to any Supported Hardware. The board has its own graphics processor and memory. Your system will only need to issue simple commands to show graphics on a 90" TV screen!

products.name: LCD 16x2 Rev C
products.shortDescription: Print up to 16 characters over 2 rows on this character display.

products.name: LCD 20x4 Rev B
products.shortDescription: Print up to 20 characters over 4 rows on this character display.

products.name: OLED 096 Rev A
products.shortDescription: This small 0.96" display is very sharp due to its OLED construction. It is B&W color, but with 128x64 pixels, it has enough resolution to show plenty of data and graphics.

products.name: Portal CP70 Rev B
products.shortDescription: Portal CP70 7" 800x400 capacitive touch display with a graphics co-processor BT817Q. Drawing using this module will be done via the graphics coprocessor and not the internal graphics engine.

products.name: TFT CP23 Rev B
products.shortDescription: 2.3" 320x240 color TFT display with capacitive touch screen, supporting Graphics in buffered and in direct modes.

products.name: TFT N18 Rev B
products.shortDescription: 1.8" - 160x128 Color TFT LCD (no touch) display, supporting Graphics.

products.name: TFT R128 Rev B
products.shortDescription: 1.28" - 240x240 Color TFT LCD round (no touch) display, supporting Graphics.

products.name: TFT T32 Rev C
products.shortDescription: 3.2-inch TFT touchscreen display for interactive applications

products.name: VFD B8 Rev C
products.shortDescription: Vacuum fluorescent displays are visually pleasing. This 8x character display looks great at any time, but it will look especially amazing in the dark!

products.name: Fan Rev B
products.shortDescription: This smart DUELink fan has speed and direction control.

products.name: Load Rev A
products.shortDescription: The Load module is designed to control up to 8 actuators. No soldering is necessary as all connections are found on a screw terminal block.

products.name: MotoMax Rev B
products.shortDescription: This heavy-duty single motor controller has some serious driving power with up to 27V and 43A!

products.name: MotoTwin Rev B
products.shortDescription: This dual motor controller is capable of driving 2 motors at 1A each, with up to 18V from two screw terminal block.

products.name: Relay P16 Rev A
products.shortDescription: When it comes to power isolation, this module comes in perfectly handy. The relays are optically-isolated from the rest of the circuit. The 16x relays are capable of up to 10A @ 250V each. The relays are powered from a 12V barrel-jack power source.

products.name: Relay P4 Rev C
products.shortDescription: Control high current loads using these 4x mechanical relays. Each relay is capable of driving up to 1A at 250V. The relays are powered from a 5V barrel-jack power source.

products.name: Relay X1 Rev A
products.shortDescription: This single mechanical relay controller is self-powered, right from the DUELink bus. It is capable of 10A @ 250V.

products.name: Servo P8 Rev B
products.shortDescription: Control up to 8x servo motors. Daisylink multiple Servo-P8 for controlling hundreds of servo motors!

products.name: Servo X1 Rev A
products.shortDescription: This DUELink 9G micro servo has everything in a single package. The motor uses power right from the DUELink bus, where it is being controlled as well.

products.name: StepPulse Rev A
products.shortDescription: This module will generate the signal (pulses) necessary to drive stepper motor controllers. There is a wide range of available controllers, including nicely isolated ones.

products.name: StepDrive P1 Rev A
products.shortDescription: This module utilizes the very common stepper motor drivers commonly used in Arduino CNC Shield. They are available in multiple models. We include a driver capable of 30V @ 1A, but you can easily swap it with your favorite driver if desired.

products.name: StepDrive P3 Rev B
products.shortDescription: This module utilizes the very common stepper motor drivers commonly used in Arduino CNC Shield. They are available in multiple models. We include drivers capable of 30V @ 1A each, but you can easily swap them with your favorite driver if desired.

products.name: CAN Rev B
products.shortDescription: CAN bus interface module for automotive and industrial networks

products.name: DMX Rev B
products.shortDescription: DMX512 lighting control interface for stage and architectural lighting

products.name: Ethernet Rev C
products.shortDescription: Ethernet connectivity module for network communications

products.name: MIDI Rev A
products.shortDescription: MIDI interface for musical instrument connectivity

products.name: RS485 Rev A
products.shortDescription: RS485 serial communication for long-distance data transfer

products.name: Serial USB Rev A
products.shortDescription: USB to serial converter for legacy device connectivity

products.name: USB Host Rev B
products.shortDescription: USB host controller for connecting USB peripherals

products.name: USB Client Rev A
products.shortDescription: USB client interface for device-mode connectivity

products.name: Button AR100 Rev B
products.shortDescription: This large 100mm Red arcade button has an internal light and can take serious punches! We also added 3x RGB LEDs around it for some exciting light shows!

products.name: BTN RGB28x4 Rev B
products.shortDescription: These four 28mm buttons are transparent white on the outside but are backlit with RGB LEDs. There are 7 possible color combinations, plus off!

products.name: Button L Rev A
products.shortDescription: Add a 10x10mm button to any project!

products.name: Button L7 Rev B
products.shortDescription: This module includes 7x 10x10mm tactile buttons.

products.name: Button S Rev A
products.shortDescription: This module offers a small "squishy" 5x5mm tactile button.

products.name: Dial Rev A
products.shortDescription: Use this module to read the position of the dial (potentiometer).

products.name: DipSwitch Rev B
products.shortDescription: Use these 10x DIP switches as you wish, usually for config, in your project.

products.name: Fingerprint Rev B
products.shortDescription: Read and match prerecorded fingerprints with this intelligent HMI sensor.

products.name: Joystick L Rev B
products.shortDescription: This is a 2-axis joystick with push button.

products.name: Keypad 3x4 Rev B
products.shortDescription: 3x4 numerical keypad with 12x "squishy" push buttons.

products.name: Keypad 4x4 Rev B
products.shortDescription: 4x4 keypad with 16x "squishy" push buttons.

products.name: Rotary Rev C
products.shortDescription: Rotary encoder with push button for menu navigation

products.name: Flash Rev A
products.shortDescription: Add 16MB of flash storage to any project. Create your own file management system or use the provided sector read/write methods.

products.name: SD Card Rev B
products.shortDescription: Access files on SD cards. Full file system facilities are provided, see File System.

products.name: MicroSD Rev A
products.shortDescription: Access files on micro SD cards. Full file system facilities are provided, see File System.

products.name: GNSS WA Rev A
products.shortDescription: This Global Navigation Satellite System (GPS, Galileo, GLONASS) module has a built-in antenna. Consider this GNSS module if you want to add your own antenna.

products.name: GNSS Rev B
products.tagline: GNSS Positioning Module with uFL Connector
products.shortDescription: This Global Navigation Satellite System (GPS, Galileo, GLONASS) module with uFL connector for external antenna. The required antenna is not included, giving the user the choice to select the right antenna.

products.name: Infrared Rev A
products.shortDescription: Use light, infrared to be exact, to send and receive data. The data is transferred over a 38Khz frequency to filter out any other surrounding infrared light.

products.name: NRF24 Max Rev C
products.tagline: Wireless NRF24 Transceiver with Amplified Antenna
products.shortDescription: Send and receive data wirelessly using SMA 2.4Ghz. The PA+LNA gives this module a coverage of up to a 1000 meters!

products.name: NRF24 Min Rev C
products.shortDescription: Send and receive data wirelessly using SMA 2.4Ghz. This module uses a simple PCB antenna. Consider NRF24 Max for a coverage of up to a 1000 meters!

products.name: RFID Rev B
products.shortDescription: Read RFID (Radio-Frequency IDentification) unique IDs from tags and access cards. The module includes tags, but any other standard tags should work.

products.name: Accel Rev A
products.shortDescription: This 3-axis accelerometer can be used to detect motion, tilt, and acceleration just to name a few.

products.name: AirQuality Rev A
products.shortDescription: This multi-gas digital sensor is used to detect surrounding air quality.

products.name: Barometer Rev B
products.shortDescription: This barometric pressure sensor also includes temperature and humidity measurements.

products.name: ClipSense Rev A
products.shortDescription: With these alligator-clip-friendly pads, users can easily connect(clip) anything that requires digital inputs/outputs. These pads also support analog and PWM (analog out) functionality.

products.name: Current Rev A
products.shortDescription: Connect the terminal block inline of AC or DC power to measure its current. The sensor has an internal resistance of 1.2 milli-ohm. It is capable of measuring up to 12.5A.

products.name: Distance Rev B
products.shortDescription: This sensor sends an ultrasonic chirp, then it measures the time it takes for the sound to bounce back. The time it takes maps to the distance between the sensor and the object it's facing.

products.name: DOF9 Rev C
products.shortDescription: This 9DoF (Degrees of Freedom) MEMS (Micro Electro Mechanical System) sensor includes 3axis accelerometer, 3axis gyro, & 3axis magnetometer. The combination of these inputs can be used to get exact tilt and orientation.

products.name: EKG Rev A
products.shortDescription: Use this module to experiment with heart EKG signals. This is NOT a medical device but an educational sensor for experimentation. The kit includes probes and sticker pads.

products.name: Gas Rev B
products.shortDescription: This gas sensor ships with MQ-7 (carbon monoxide) installed. However, the module uses a socket allowing the sensor be be easily swapped with other gas sensors, like MQ-3 alcohol gas sensor.

products.name: Light Rev A
products.shortDescription: A good sensor for detecting daytime or when lights are turned on. This is not an accurate light level sensor, but provides overall ambient light levels.

products.name: Motion Rev B
products.shortDescription: PIR (Passive Infrared) motion sensors use light in its view to detect motion.

products.name: Pressure Rev B
products.shortDescription: Connect this sensor to your instrument using a tiny pipe to measure water/liquid pressure. Different ranges are available.

products.name: RTC Rev B
products.shortDescription: This module is a RTC (Real Time Clock) "time sensor" with a backup battery to keep time running even when the system is powered off.

products.name: TempHmd Rev B
products.shortDescription: Measure temperature with +-0.5 degree of accuracy at 0.1 celsius resolution. The humidity sensor is +=2RH% accurate with a resolution of 0.1%RH.

products.name: TempRTD Rev B
products.shortDescription: This sensor uses the included RTD (Resistance Temperature Detector) to measure temperatures.

products.name: LED MT1208 Rev A
products.shortDescription: Use these 96 dazzling LEDs to show text, create flashy games, or run whatever effect you desire. You will be surprised with how much you can do with a 12x8 LED matrix!

products.name: LED R16 Rev B
products.shortDescription: A ring with 16 LEDs.

products.name: LED RGB3 Rev A
products.shortDescription: A visual LED with 3x RGB LEDs. These lights can be set to any of 7 colors or can be turned off.

products.name: LED S284 Rev B
products.shortDescription: These 0.28" 4-digit 7-segment displays come in two types: a counter with decimal point, and timer with a colon in the middle.

products.name: LED S404 Rev A
products.shortDescription: These 0.40" 4-digit 7-segment displays come in two types: a counter with decimal point, and timer with a colon in the middle.

products.name: LED S564 Rev A
products.shortDescription: These 0.56" 4-digit 7-segment displays come in two types: a counter with decimal point, and timer with a colon in the middle.

products.name: LED SS805
products.shortDescription: 14-segment displays ar good to display alpha-numerical info. This 0.80 is a decent size to be visible from a few feet.

products.name: Smart LED Rev A
products.shortDescription: The DUELink standard library includes support for WS2811 smart LEDs. When using matrices, the support is even included with the graphics function.

products.name: Buzzer Rev B
products.shortDescription: Use this peizo buzzer to generate tones and simple melodies. Sound an alarm, play a melody when a task is finished or even generate noises!

products.name: MP3 Rev A
products.shortDescription: Play MP3 audio/music from files found on the attached Micro SD card. The audio quality is reasonable and single mono channel. There is no system load as the module only receives and processes simple commands.

products.name: Radio FM Rev A
products.shortDescription: Use simple commands to set the channel and audio level on this FM Radio Receiver. The module includes a standard 3.5mm stereo audio plug, for connecting headphones or amplified speakers.

products.name: Spectrum Rev A
products.shortDescription: This module breaks down the incoming audio into 63Hz, 160Hz, 400Hz, 1Khz, 2.5Khz, 6.25Khz, 16Khz. It then measures the audio level at these frequencies.

products.name: Barcode L1D2D Rev A
products.shortDescription: 1D/2D barcode and QR code scanner module

products.name: Thermal Rev A
products.shortDescription: Thermal imaging camera for heat detection

products.name: Dio X12 Rev A
products.shortDescription: 12-channel digital I/O expansion module

products.name: DueClick Rev A
products.shortDescription: MikroE Click board adapter for extended functionality

products.name: DuePi Rev B
products.shortDescription: Raspberry Pi HAT adapter for Pi compatibility

products.name: DuePico Rev B
products.shortDescription: Raspberry Pi Pico adapter for RP2040 integration
